wf-creator-manual-subtitle: All the resources to help you create the perfect tutorial!
wf-contribute-subtitle: Our mission is to teach the world how to make anything themselves. We need your help!
wf-contribute-createtuto-subtitle1: Get started and share your skills.
wf-contribute-getstart-subtitle1: The basics for a successful tutorial.
wf-contribute-help-subtitle1: Everything about Wikifab and how it works.
wf-contribute-takingpictures-subtitle1: Our lesson on how to take great pictures for your tutorial
wf-contribute-joincommunity: Want to join the Wikifab community?
wf-formtutorial-alert: Oops ! You do not have permission to create a page because your are not log in. To create a page, $1 or $2
wf-formtutorial-main-placeholder: Enter the name of your tutorial
wf-formtutorial-main-subtitle: Learn how to pick the perfect name for your tutorial.
wf-formtutorial-main-picture-tooltip: This picture is used to illustrate your page. Privilégiez le format paysage (idéalement 800 x 600 px).
wf-formtutorial-tag-field-tooltip: Separate each keyword by a comma (ie: Wood, Metal, 3D printing, etc.)
wf-formtutorial-type-popup-creation: your tutorial concerns an object to create (ie: a radio-controlled drone)
wf-formtutorial-type-popup-technique: your tutorial concerns a technique to learn (ie: to tile a floor)
wf-formtutorial-description-field-placeh: Describe your tutorial in a few sentences.
wf-formtutorial-difficulty-popup-text1: Accessible to everyone. An 8 year old child can follow the tutorial without difficulty
wf-formtutorial-difficulty-popup-text2: Accessible to all. An adult can follow the tutorial without difficulty
wf-formtutorial-difficulty-popup-text3: Only an informed adult can follow the tutorial. Requires no special skills
wf-formtutorial-difficulty-popup-text4: Requires mastery of technical skills. An amateur may, however, follow the tutorial
wf-formtutorial-difficulty-popup-text5: Usually reserved for professionals. Requires the mastery of complex technical skills
wf-formtutorial-tags-popup: Enter 4 to 6 keywords to describe your tutorial (separated by comma)
wf-formtutorial-cost-popup: Approx. cost of the materials supposing you need to buy them all (excluding tools).
wf-formtutorial-duration-popup: Total duration to complete the tutorial (resting, drying times etc. included).
wf-prerequisites-tabs-placeholder: Search and add a prerequisite tutorial
wf-formtutorial-pagesource-popup: Link to the initial page if it's a translation. Leave empty if it's a new page.
wf-formtutorial-language-popup: The language code of the current page.
wf-formtutorial-URL-tooltip: The full URL with the http(s):// prefix.
wf-formtutorial-file-tabs-option2: Add link(s) to external file management platform
wf-group-subtitle: Create or join a community of makers
wf-formgroup-baseline: You are member of a Fablab, an association, a school, or any other community project ? You can create a group to gather your tutorials and members on a page, with yours colors. No less !
wf-formgroup-alert: Oops ! You do not have permission to create a group because your are not log in. To create a group, $1 or $2
wf-formgroup-create-button-placeholder: Choose a name for your group
wf-formgroup-welcome-baseline: We have created groups to enable you to gather your tutorials and members together on the same page.
wf-formgroup-section-onepage-title: All your tutorials on a personalized page
wf-formgroup-section-onepage-text: Customize your group with logo and banner. Anyone can join your group, by clicking "Join this group".
wf-formgroup-section-animate-text: Fill in your informations : machines, calendar and description. Members are notified when something is added or changed in the group.
wf-formgroup-section-forwho-title: To whom groups have been created?
wf-formgroup-section-forwho-text: To everyone! If you are a group of people or a single person, groups will enable you to gather on a single page all your tutorials together.
wf-formgroup-section-forwho-others: Others (groups are really open to all of you)
wf-formgroup-section-howto-title: How to add a tutorial to a group?
wf-formgroup-section-howto-text: It's very simple, you can do it in 2 clicks.
wf-formgroup-section-howto-tabs-join-tex: On the group's page, click on "Join" button.
wf-formgroup-section-howto-tabs-add-titl: Add a tutorial to a group
wf-formgroup-section-howto-tabs-add-text: On the tutorial's page, click on "Add to group" bouton, and choose the group in witch you want to add it.
wf-formgroup-section-howto-tabs-done-tit: Voila ! Your tutorial is added to the group
wf-formgroup-section-howto-tabs-done-tex: Anyone can add or remove a tutoriel to any group.
wf-formgroup-fieldinfo-type: Just choose the type which describe you the best
wf-formgroup-fieldplaceholder-descriptio: Write a long description for the group.
wf-formgroup-fieldplaceholder-machinedes: Usable materials, work area, possible applicationMatériaux utilisables, surface de travail et applications possibles de cette machine
wf-formgroup-fieldplaceholder-machinetar: ie: 20$/h. Use Ex: 20€/h. Supervised by the fabmanager.
wf-mainpage-subtitle: Wikifab empowers individuals to share their creative skills with the rest of the world.
wf-propertycomplete-check: Check this box when the tutorial is complete
wf-completetooltip-published-description: The page appears in the search results and can be translated.
wf-completetooltip-draft-description: La page appears only on the first author's profile and can't be translated.
wf-formtutorial-popuplicense-licence1-de: This license lets others distribute, remix, tweak, and build upon your work, even commercially, as long as they credit you for the original creation. This is the most accommodating of licenses offered. Recommended for maximum dissemination and use of licensed materials.
wf-formtutorial-popuplicense-licence2-de: This license lets others remix, tweak, and build upon your work even for commercial purposes, as long as they credit you and license their new creations under the identical terms. This license is often compared to “copyleft” free and open source software licenses. All new works based on yours will carry the same license, so any derivatives will also allow commercial use. This is the license used by Wikipedia, and is recommended for materials that would benefit from incorporating content from Wikipedia and similarly licensed projects.
wf-formtutorial-popuplicense-question: Why those two licenses? What is my interest in publishing my tutorials under these licenses? Read our vision and share your thoughts on
wf-formtutorial-popuptutoname-title: How to pick the perfect name for your tutorial
wf-formtutorial-popuptutoname-subtitle: For the sake of consistency and search optimization, take the time to think about the name of your tutorial:
wf-formtutorial-popuptutoname-option1: If your tutorial concerns the fabrication of an object:
wf-formtutorial-popuptutoname-option1a: Enter the name of the object directly. Do not precede the name with an article (a, the).
wf-formtutorial-popuptutoname-option1d: Do not start the name of your tutorial with the verbs "Make", "Build", "Create", etc. The verb doesn't provide useful information to the user since they already know that they are looking to "make" or "build" something.
wf-formtutorial-popuptutoname-option1f: Specify the main material used, to clarify what your tutorial is about
wf-formtutorial-popuptutoname-option1g: Prefer: Table made from oak and metal
wf-formtutorial-popuptutoname-option2: If your tutorial concerns a technique:
wf-formtutorial-popuptutoname-option2a: Always start with an infinitive verb that describes the technique.
wf-formtutorial-popuptutoname-option2b: Do not start the name of your tutorial by the verbs "Learn", "How to", etc. The verb doesn't provide useful information to the user, since they already know that they are looking to "Learn" something.
wf-formtutorial-popuptutoname-option2d: Rather than: How to sand down a table
wf-formtutorial-popuptutoname-last: If a tutorial with the name you have entered already exists, you will be sent to the form for editing that tutorial.
wf-systemmessages-badaccess-message: Oops ! You do not have permission to edit this page because your are not log in. To edit this page,
wf-systemmessages-confirmedittext-messag: Please confirm your email address! You have to confirm your email address to edit a page. To do so, go to your
wf-systemmessages-confirmemail-text03: Please confirm your email address by visiting the following URL:
wf-systemmessages-confirmemail-text04: If you HAVEN'T created this account, you can click here to CANCEL the account creation:
wf-systemmessages-confirmemail-text08: Your email address is now verified.
wf-systemmessages-userboard-boardtoboard: All my messages with this user
wf-systemmessages-welcomecreation: You will receive an email with an account creation confirmation link.
help-subtitle: A question? Search by topic in the list bellow.
help-choisir-le-nom-de-son-tutoriel: Pick a name for your tutorial
help-modifier-le-contenu-du-tutoriel: Edit the content of a tutorial
help-personnaliser-les-options-de-modifi: Customize the modification options of a tutorial
help-consulter-l-historique-d-une-page: See the history of a tutorial
help-ajouter-retirer-une-page-de-la-list: Add or remove a tutorial from your watchlist
help-rechercher-un-tutoriel-dans-une-aut: Search for a tutorial in another language
help-voir-la-liste-des-tutoriels-non-tra: See the list of untranslated tutorials
help-changer-la-langue-de-l-interface: Change the language of the interface
help-consulter-un-tutoriel-dans-une-autr: Read a tutorial in another language
help-modifier-les-droits-d-un-utilisateu: Modify the rights of a user
help-envoyer-un-message-a-un-utilisateur: Send a message to a user
help-suivre-les-contributions-d-un-utili: Follow the contributions of a user
help-creer-un-compte-01: Creating a user account enables you to enjoy all the functionalities of the Dokit platform. Without this account, you can only view the tutorials already created. You can not create new contents or modify them.
help-creer-un-compte-02: Click on the icon $1 at the top right of the screen and select '''Create account'''.
help-creer-un-compte-04: Optional fields can be filled out later in the '''$1''' and '''$2''' sections.
help-creer-un-compte-05: If you leave the '''email address''' field blank, you will not be able to find your forgotten password.
help-creer-un-compte-07: You will receive an email in order to finalize your registration and confirm your email address.
help-creer-un-compte-08: You must confirm your email address in order to create or modify tutorials. (see section '''$1''' to do it later)
help-creer-un-compte-10: Click on the first link to confirm your address.
help-confirmer-son-adresse-email-01: In order to create or modify tutorials, you need to confirm the email address linked to your account. This is generally done when creating your account. If you want to do it later, you can follow the steps bellow.
help-confirmer-son-adresse-email-04: In '''User Profile''', go to the '''Email Options''' section.
help-confirmer-son-adresse-email-06: Give your '''username''' and '''password''' again as requested.
help-confirmer-son-adresse-email-07: Fill in your new email address.
help-confirmer-son-adresse-email-08: You will receive an email to finalize your registration and confirm your email address.
help-confirmer-son-adresse-email-09: Click on the first link to confirm your email address.
help-se-connecter-se-deconnecter-02: Click the icon $1 and select '''Log in'''.
help-se-connecter-se-deconnecter-03: Enter your username and password, and check '''Keep me logged in''' if you want to stay connected to the platform.
help-modifier-son-profil-02: You can modify the information displayed in your profile in the tab '''User Profile'''. Users can view them by clicking on your profile.
help-modifier-son-profil-03: Click on the icon $1 and select '''My profile'''.
help-modifier-son-profil-06: Click on '''Update''' to save your changes.
help-modifier-son-profil-09: Select the file on your computer.
help-modifier-son-profil-10: Your picture must be in jpeg, png or gif format. Its size must not exceed '''100 ko''''.
help-modifier-son-profil-11: Click on '''Upload file''' to save your changes.
help-modifier-son-profil-13: If you did not specify your email address during your registration, see '''$1'''.
help-modifier-son-profil-14: Enter your new email address in the field '''New email address'''.
help-modifier-son-profil-15: Click on '''Change email''' to save your changes.
help-modifier-son-profil-16: You will receive an email in order to confirm your email address.
help-modifier-son-profil-17: You must confirm your email address in order to create or modify tutorials. (see section '''$1''')
help-modifier-vos-preferences-02: Click on the icon $1 and select '''Preferences'''.
help-modifier-vos-preferences-04: Enter your new password in the first field.
help-modifier-vos-preferences-05: Confirm the new password by typing it again in the field below.
help-modifier-vos-preferences-06: Click on '''Change credentials''' to save your changes.
help-modifier-vos-preferences-08: To reset your password, you must have first entered an email address in your personal information (see section '''$1''').
help-modifier-vos-preferences-10: Fill out one of the requested field: your '''username''' or '''email address'''.
help-modifier-vos-preferences-12: An email with a temporary password will be sent to the email address provided. This temporary password will expire 7 days after the reception.
help-modifier-vos-preferences-13: Go back to the Log in page and enter your username and temporary password.
help-modifier-vos-preferences-15: Enter your new password and confirm it again in the field below.
help-modifier-vos-preferences-16: Click on '''Continue login''' to save the changes.
help-modifier-vos-preferences-18: Click on '''Restore all default settings (in all sections)''' at the bottom of the page.
help-modifier-vos-preferences-19: Click again on '''Restore all default settings (in all sections)''' to confirm your choice.
help-afficher-les-nouvelles-notification: Click on the icon $1 at the top right of your screen to display new notifications.
Click on '''…….''' « Mark group as read? »
Click on '''All notifications''' in the pop-up window to view all your notifications.
help-parametrer-ses-notifications-01: There are 2 ways to set up your notifications:
help-parametrer-ses-notifications-03: This section enables your to configure your email notifications.
help-parametrer-ses-notifications-04: Click on '''Edit profile''' and click on the tab '''Notification'''.
help-parametrer-ses-notifications-08: This section enables you to configure your email notifications and the notifications displayed directly on the Dokit platform.
help-parametrer-ses-notifications-10: Choose and check the relevant boxes.
help-parametrer-ses-notifications-11: Click on '''Save''' to save your changes.
help-choisir-le-nom-de-son-tutoriel-02: Enter the name of your tutorial in the following field.
help-choisir-le-nom-de-son-tutoriel-04: Click on Create or modify to confirm.
help-choisir-le-nom-de-son-tutoriel-07: Fill out the properties in the corresponding fields.
help-choisir-le-nom-de-son-tutoriel-08: Add a main picture at the right side to illustrate your tutorial.
help-mettre-en-forme-01: You can format and structure your content to make it clearer.
help-mettre-en-forme-02: Click on $1 to chose a predifined formatting.
help-mettre-en-forme-03: Click on $1 to set your text in '''bold''' and '''italic'''.
help-mettre-en-forme-04: Click on $1 to insert a '''list''' or modify the '''indentations'''.
help-mettre-en-forme-05: Click on $1 to insert a '''table''', '''special characters''' or '''help icons'''.
help-mettre-en-forme-06: Help icons can be used for the following reasons:
help-mettre-en-forme-10: Use $1 to warn from a danger
help-inserer-une-image-01: Import your pictures directly in your steps:
help-inserer-une-image-02: Chose the step in which your want to import your picture.
help-inserer-une-image-03: A step can contain up to 6 pictures. The allowed files types are: '''.jpeg''',  '''.png''', '''.gif'''. The file size is limited to '''10 Mo'''.
help-inserer-une-image-04: Click on '''$1''' and select all the pictures your want to import for the step.
help-inserer-une-image-06: You can also import all your picture all at once by using the '''images gallery'''. To do this:
help-inserer-une-image-07: Click on $1 at the top left of the page. The image gallery will open.
help-inserer-une-image-08: Click on $1 and '''Select on your computer''' all the picture or '''drag and drop''' your pictures directly in the images gallery.
help-inserer-une-image-09: ''Drag and drop''' your pictures from the gallery into the corresponding steps.
help-inserer-une-video-01: To importe your videos into a tutorial:
help-inserer-une-video-02: A step can contain up to 6 videos. The allowed file type is '''/mp4'''. The file size is limited to '''10 Mo'''.
help-inserer-une-video-03: Click on $1 and '''Select on your computer''' all the video to upload on your tutorial.
help-inserer-une-video-04: ''Drag and drop''' your videos from the gallery into the corresponding steps.
help-ajouter-des-annotations-sur-une-ima: Click on $1 in the pictures frame to add annotations on your picture.
Choose the desired color by clicking on $1.
Select the tools $1 to frame, circle or show an object in the picture with an arrow.
Use the tool $1 to delete an annotation.
Click on '''Save''' to add annotations on your image or '''Cancel''' to return to the creation interface.
help-inserer-un-lien-01: In the creation interface, you can insert an internal link (to another page of the website) or an external link (to another website).
help-inserer-un-lien-02: Select the text or the picture on which you want to add a link.
help-inserer-un-lien-04: In the tab '''Search pages''', start writing the page name you want to link.
help-inserer-un-lien-06: In the tab '''External link''', copy and past the link to the website of your choice.
help-importer-un-fichier-01: On the creation interface, you can import a file in the section '''Tools and Materials'''.
help-importer-un-fichier-03: Click on '''Add a file''' to import a file from your computer.
help-importer-un-fichier-06: Click on '''Add a file''' to import another file.
help-importer-un-fichier-07: The file size is limited to '''10 Mo'''. The allowed files types are: $1
help-renommer-un-tutoriel-01: Click on the tutorial you want to modify.
help-renommer-un-tutoriel-02: Click on '''Move''' in the tab at the top of the screen.
help-renommer-un-tutoriel-03: Make sure you read the advertisements related to the modification of a tutorial name. You can find them above the form to rename the page.
help-renommer-un-tutoriel-04: Rename your tutorial with the '''New title''' field.
help-renommer-un-tutoriel-05: Note in the following filed the reason for renaming it.
help-renommer-un-tutoriel-06: Some common motives to rename a page:
help-renommer-un-tutoriel-07: The title doesn’t respect the conventions of the platform
help-renommer-un-tutoriel-08: The title contains a grammatical or typing mistake
help-renommer-un-tutoriel-09: The title doesn’t describe the content well
help-renommer-un-tutoriel-10: Creation of a page of homonymy
help-renommer-un-tutoriel-11: Check the '''Watch source page and target page''' box if you want to be notified of all future changes.
help-renommer-un-tutoriel-12: Click on '''Move page''' to register the modifications.
help-modifier-le-contenu-du-tutoriel-02: Click on '''Edit''' in the tab bar on top of the tutorial.
help-modifier-le-contenu-du-tutoriel-03: You can now edit, add or delete the contents of your tutorial.
help-modifier-le-contenu-du-tutoriel-04: Click on '''Save''' to confirm your changes.
help-modifier-le-contenu-du-tutoriel-05: You can see the changes you made in the '''History''' section of the tutorial. Click on '''History''' in the tab bar on top of the screen.
help-supprimer-un-tutoriel-01: Only administrators can remove a tutorial. To request a deletion, contact an administrator by mail or through his user profile. See $1 for more details.
help-acceder-a-l-historique-de-modificat: Click on the tutorial of which you want to see the history.
Click on '''History''' in the tab bar on top of the tutorial.
You can compare two versions of a tutorial by clicking on the '''History''' tab.
Select the version to compare by checking the $1 box.
Click on '''Compare selected revisions''' to see the revisions on the actual version compared to the one you selected.
Select the previous version to return to.
Click on '''Edit''' next to the date of the previous version.
Click on '''Save''' to restore the version.
help-explorer-parmi-tous-les-tutoriels-0: To search for a tutorial, '''type a keyword''' in the research bar at the top of the screen.
Click on '''Explore''' next to the research field.
You will land on the Advanced research page. The interface is made of several scrolling lists an an horizon list of tags to select the searching modalities.
Select the search elements you want in the list.
The selected categories will be displayed under the lists.
help-explorer-parmi-tous-les-tutoriels-1: Click on the cross on the right side of a category to remove it. There is no number limit for categories.
help-exporter-un-tutoriel-en-pdf-01: Click on the tutorial you want to export.
help-poser-une-question-02: Click on '''Discussion''' in the tab bar on top of the tutorial.
help-poser-une-question-03: Click on the '''Start a new topic''' field and type your question.
help-poser-une-question-04: Write your message in the box below.
help-poser-une-question-05: If you are not logged in and that the access rights allow it, the question will be associated to your IP address.
help-poser-une-question-06: When you ask a question, people can answer in the '''Reply to your question''' filed.
help-poser-une-question-08: Type your answer in the field '''Reply'''.
help-liste-de-suivi-01: Watch a page allows you to receive a notification each time the page is edited.
help-liste-de-suivi-03: You can also access the watchlist by clicking on $1.
help-liste-de-suivi-05: Select '''View and remove titles on your watchlist''' or '''Edit raw watchlist'''.
help-liste-de-suivi-06: Raw watchlist mode enables you to edit the list as a text block.
help-langues-01: Only finished tutorials can be translated.
help-langues-02: Click on '''Show results in all languages''' in the filters tab.
help-langues-03: When you activate Show results in all languages, the language code is displayed under the tutorial thumbnail, on the right.
help-langues-04: Open the modification page of one of your tutorials (see $1 for more details).
help-langues-05: Make sure you have checked the '''Check this box when the tutorial is complete''' at the bottom of the page.
help-langues-08: The '''Translate''' tabs will appear in the menu bar on top of the screen.
help-langues-09: Only users logged in can see the '''Translate''' tab.
help-langues-11: The translation interface automaticaly retrieved the sentences to translate (named '''Strings''').
help-langues-12: Choose a target language to translate the sentences one by one.
help-langues-14: By default, the language of the interface is the same as your navigator.
help-langues-15: Click on the '''flag at the up-right corner''' of the main page to change the language of the interface.
help-langues-16: Choose the language of your choice.
help-langues-17: Changing the language of the interface doesn’t change the language of the tutorial you’re watching (see $1).
help-langues-18: Click on the language you want in the Other languages section just above the contents.
help-users-01: Each tutorial is associated to its creator.
help-users-02: Click on the author's name below the tutorial to access the '''User profile'''.
help-users-03: In the '''Tutorials''' tab you directly land on, you can see the tutorials made by the user.
help-users-04: Click on the '''Contributions''' tab to see history edits on the platform.
help-users-07: Type your message and click on '''Send'''.
help-users-08: You can be notified of any contribution of a selected user.
help-users-10: Click on '''Follow''' at the top right corner of the page.
help-users-11: To unfollow a user, just click on Unfollow in the same place.
help-brouillons-01: When you edit a page, your modifications are automatically saved.
help-brouillons-02: In case of session loss, return to the edit form of the unsaved page.
help-brouillons-03: Click on '''Recover''' in the drafts list.
help-brouillons-04: All of your saved drafts are available from the page $1.
help-admin-block-01: Only users with administrator rights can block another user. To use this feature, contact an administrator of the plateform.
help-admin-block-02: To block a user, go to $1, type the '''username''' of the user in question and click on '''Block'''.
help-admin-rights-01: Only users with administrator rights can modify the access rights of another user. To use this feature, contact an administrator of the plateform.
help-admin-rights-02: To modify the access rights of a user, go to the page $1, type the '''username''' of the user in question and choose the relevent group(s) you want to add to this user.
help-translate-01: Like the Wiki model, any page can be translated by any user. If you want to participate to the translation, go to $1 to see the list of pages to translate or in progress.
help-recent-changes-01: To see the list of recent modifications, go to $1.
help-recent-changes-02: To see the list of last discussions, go to $1 and select '''Topic''' in the drop-down list '''Name space'''.
wf-mainpage-nl-subtitle: Our news and some projects chosen by our team, from time to time.
dokit-video-youtube-placeholder: Enter here the URL of a Youtube video
dokit-video-vimeo-placeholder: Enter here the URL of a Vimeo video
dokit-video-dailymotion-placeholder: Enter here the URL of a Dailymotion video
